Arkalumen.title: Arkalumen
Arkalumen.about: Arkalumen is a Candian LED lighting company. They were looking for a site to showcase their line of OEM products.

House of Carlyle.title: House of Carlyle
House of Carlyle.about: The House of Carlyle is a blog run by a Toronto based comedy writer. The site is built on Wordpress

Jane Noble.title: Jane Noble
Jane Noble.about: Jane Noble is an incredibly talents actor living in Orange County, California. And yes, she is also my mother.

Advanceit.title: Advanceit
Advanceit.about: Advanceit is a the leading merchant cash advance provider in Canada. I ported their main website to use CodeIgniter, and developed the front-end development of their internal funding platform.

Context.IO.title: EmailToBox
Context.IO.about: I worked closely with Bruno Morency at Context.IO to develop an an email app for the Box.net market place. The app can be installed here.

Shopify.title: Rustic (Shopify Theme)
Shopify.about: I worked closely with Bruno Morency at Context.IO to develop an an email app for the Box.net market place. The app can be installed here.

1.title: Burnreel
1.summary: When I’m not building sites for clients, I’m working on Burnreel, a social movie review website with my co-founder Robert Brockie.

2.title: Perzoot
2.summary:
Perzoot was a project I worked on with Daniel Nephin, a job search aggrator aimed at improving the job search experiece.

I focused on the UI and developed features missing from many other job posting aggregator services. It is now defunct, but you can view the project here.
